Text.p: A new Tier 5 Raid Boss was released today! It is Cresselia!
I was trying to get my previous update out, and then this happened!

Unfortunately, I'm tired and just can't finish this tonight. However, I wanted you to get as much as possible up front.
I have updated the Encounters, Raid Bosses, Shopping Boxes started the Special Research, etc. I'll finish up everything as soon as I can and update again. (Sorry, I have a busy weekend so it might take a while.)
